name: Afghanistan
info: Afghanistan is a landlocked country in South Asia, known for its rugged mountains, ancient history along the Silk Road, and rich cultural heritage.

name: Albania
info: Albania is a country in Southeast Europe known for its stunning Adriatic and Ionian coastlines, ancient ruins, and Ottoman architecture.

name: Algeria
info: Algeria is Africa's largest country by area, with 80% covered by the Sahara Desert, known for its Mediterranean coastline and ancient Roman ruins.

name: Argentina
info: Argentina is famous for tango, beef, wine, football legend Maradona, and stunning landscapes from Patagonia to the Andes mountains.

name: Armenia
info: Armenia was the first nation to officially adopt Christianity in 301 AD, known for its ancient monasteries and Mount Ararat views.

name: Australia
info: Australia is known for its unique wildlife including kangaroos and koalas, stunning beaches, the Great Barrier Reef, and the vast Outback desert.

name: Austria
info: Austria is famous for Mozart, stunning Alpine scenery, imperial palaces, and Vienna's classical music heritage.

name: Azerbaijan
info: Azerbaijan is known as the 'Land of Fire' due to natural gas fires, with rich oil reserves and a blend of Eastern and Western cultures.

name: Bahamas
info: The Bahamas is an archipelago of 700 islands known for pristine beaches, clear turquoise waters, and luxury resorts.

name: Bahrain
info: Bahrain is a small island nation and major financial hub in the Persian Gulf, known for pearl diving history and modern architecture.

name: Bangladesh
info: Bangladesh is a South Asian country known for its natural beauty, cricket passion, vibrant culture, and the world's largest mangrove forest - the Sundarbans.

name: Barbados
info: Barbados is a Caribbean island known for beautiful beaches, rum production, cricket, and being the birthplace of Rihanna.

name: Belarus
info: Belarus is known for vast forests covering 40% of the country, Soviet-era architecture, and the ancient BiaÅ‚owieÅ¼a Forest.

name: Belgium
info: Belgium is famous for chocolate, waffles, beer, medieval towns, and being the headquarters of the European Union.

name: Belize
info: Belize has the world's second-largest barrier reef, ancient Mayan ruins, and diverse ecosystems from rainforests to beaches.

name: Bhutan
info: Bhutan measures Gross National Happiness, preserves its Buddhist culture, and is known for stunning Himalayan monasteries.

name: Bolivia
info: Bolivia is home to the stunning Salar de Uyuni salt flats, Lake Titicaca, and La Paz - the world's highest administrative capital.

name: Bosnia and Herzegovina
info: Known for the historic Stari Most bridge in Mostar, diverse cultural heritage, and beautiful mountainous landscapes.

name: Botswana
info: Botswana is home to the Okavango Delta, abundant wildlife, stable democracy, and significant diamond resources.

name: Brazil
info: Brazil is the largest country in South America, famous for football, carnival, the Amazon rainforest, and its vibrant, diverse culture.

name: Brunei
info: Brunei is a tiny but wealthy nation on Borneo, known for oil wealth, the Sultan's opulent palace, and pristine rainforests.

name: Bulgaria
info: Bulgaria is famous for rose oil production, Black Sea beaches, ancient Thracian history, and the Cyrillic alphabet's origin.

name: Cambodia
info: Cambodia is home to the magnificent Angkor Wat temple complex, rich Khmer heritage, and the Mekong River.

name: Cameroon
info: Cameroon is called 'Africa in miniature' for its diverse geography, cultures, and wildlife from rainforests to savannas.

name: Canada
info: Canada is the second-largest country by area, known for its natural beauty, multiculturalism, maple syrup, and friendly people.

name: Chile
info: Chile is a long, narrow country stretching along South America's western edge, famous for wine, Atacama Desert, and Patagonia.

name: China
info: China is the world's most populous country with a rich history spanning thousands of years, home to the Great Wall and the Terracotta Army.

name: Colombia
info: Colombia is famous for world-class coffee, emeralds, salsa dancing, diverse ecosystems, and colorful colonial cities.

name: Costa Rica
info: Costa Rica abolished its army in 1949, leads in eco-tourism, and hosts 5% of world's biodiversity in rainforests.

name: Croatia
info: Croatia is known for stunning Adriatic coastline with 1,000+ islands, Game of Thrones filming locations, and ancient Roman ruins.

name: Cuba
info: Cuba is famous for classic cars, cigars, rum, salsa music, revolutionary history, and colorful colonial architecture in Havana.

name: Cyprus
info: Cyprus is a Mediterranean island with ancient Greek mythology connections, beautiful beaches, and a divided capital Nicosia.

name: Czech Republic
info: The Czech Republic is famous for Prague's Gothic architecture, world-class beer, Bohemian castles, and puppet traditions.

name: Denmark
info: Denmark consistently ranks as one of the world's happiest countries, known for design, Vikings, and hygge lifestyle.

name: Dominican Republic
info: The Dominican Republic shares Hispaniola island with Haiti, famous for pristine beaches, merengue music, and baseball.

name: Ecuador
info: Ecuador is home to the GalÃ¡pagos Islands, the equator line, Amazon rainforest, and stunning Andean highlands.

name: Egypt
info: Egypt is known for its ancient civilization, iconic pyramids, the Sphinx, and the life-giving Nile River that flows through the desert.

name: Estonia
info: Estonia is one of the world's most digitally advanced nations, known for e-governance, medieval Tallinn, and forests covering 50% of land.

name: Ethiopia
info: Ethiopia is the birthplace of coffee, has its own ancient calendar, and was never colonized, maintaining independence throughout history.

name: Fiji
info: Fiji is an archipelago of 330+ islands known for crystal-clear waters, coral reefs, luxury resorts, and friendly 'Bula' greeting.

name: Finland
info: Finland is the world's happiest country, home to Santa Claus, saunas, Northern Lights, and has 188,000 lakes.

name: France
info: France is a European country famous for art, culture, fashion, wine, and cuisine. Home to the iconic Eiffel Tower and the Louvre Museum.

name: Georgia
info: Georgia is considered the birthplace of wine (8,000 years ago), known for stunning Caucasus mountains and unique alphabet.

name: Germany
info: Germany is Europe's largest economy, famous for engineering excellence, automotive industry, beer culture, and rich historical heritage.

name: Ghana
info: Ghana was the first sub-Saharan African country to gain independence, known as the Gold Coast for its gold resources and cocoa.

name: Greece
info: Greece is the cradle of Western civilization, democracy, and philosophy, home to ancient ruins, beautiful islands, and mythology.

name: Guatemala
info: Guatemala has the largest Mayan population, stunning ancient ruins at Tikal, colorful textiles, and volcanic landscapes.

name: Haiti
info: Haiti was the first independent black republic and the first country to permanently abolish slavery through revolution in 1804.

name: Honduras
info: Honduras is home to CopÃ¡n Mayan ruins, Caribbean beaches, coral reefs, and cloud forests with diverse wildlife.

name: Hungary
info: Hungary is famous for Budapest's thermal baths, beautiful Danube River, goulash soup, and vibrant folk traditions.

name: Iceland
info: Iceland is the land of fire and ice with volcanoes, geysers, hot springs, glaciers, and spectacular Northern Lights.

name: India
info: India is the world's most populous democracy and seventh-largest country by area, known for its rich cultural heritage, diverse traditions, and the Taj Mahal.

name: Indonesia
info: Indonesia is the world's largest archipelago with 17,000+ islands, home to Bali, Komodo dragons, and diverse cultures.

name: Iran
info: Iran has one of the world's oldest continuous civilizations, known for Persian carpets, ancient Persepolis ruins, and poetry.

name: Iraq
info: Iraq is the cradle of civilization, home to ancient Mesopotamia, the Tigris and Euphrates rivers, and Babylon.

name: Ireland
info: Ireland is the Emerald Isle known for stunning green landscapes, Celtic heritage, friendly pubs, music, and literature.

name: Israel
info: Israel is the Holy Land with Jerusalem's religious sites, Dead Sea, high-tech innovation, and ancient archaeological treasures.

name: Italy
info: Italy is famous for its art, history, architecture, fashion, and cuisine. Home to Rome, Venice, the Colosseum, and Renaissance masterpieces.

name: Jamaica
info: Jamaica is the birthplace of reggae music and Bob Marley, famous for beaches, jerk cuisine, and world-class sprinters.

name: Japan
info: Japan is an island nation renowned for its technology, anime culture, cherry blossoms, and the perfect blend of ancient traditions with modern innovation.

name: Jordan
info: Jordan is home to the ancient city of Petra, Dead Sea, Wadi Rum desert, and rich biblical history.

name: Kazakhstan
info: Kazakhstan is the world's largest landlocked country, known for vast steppes, space launch facility at Baikonur, and nomadic heritage.

name: Kenya
info: Kenya is famous for incredible wildlife safaris, the Great Migration, Maasai culture, and world-champion marathon runners.

name: Kuwait
info: Kuwait is a small but wealthy Gulf state with vast oil reserves, modern architecture, and rich maritime trading history.

name: Laos
info: Laos is a landlocked country with golden Buddhist temples, Mekong River, French colonial architecture, and laid-back charm.

name: Latvia
info: Latvia is known for Art Nouveau architecture in Riga, pristine beaches, dense forests, and the famous Song Festival.

name: Lebanon

name: Lithuania
info: Lithuania is passionate about basketball, has a beautiful medieval old town in Vilnius, and the Hill of Crosses.

name: Luxembourg
info: Luxembourg is one of the world's wealthiest countries, a financial hub with fairy-tale castles and the world's highest minimum wage.

name: Madagascar
info: Madagascar is the world's fourth-largest island with unique wildlife - 90% of species found nowhere else, including lemurs and baobabs.

name: Malaysia
info: Malaysia is known for Petronas Towers, tropical rainforests, diverse cultures, delicious street food, and pristine islands.

name: Maldives
info: The Maldives is a tropical paradise of 1,200 coral islands, famous for luxury resorts, crystal waters, and incredible diving.

name: Mali
info: Mali was home to the ancient city of Timbuktu, a center of Islamic learning, and the legendary wealthy Mansa Musa.

name: Malta
info: Malta is a Mediterranean island with 7,000 years of history, Knights of Malta heritage, and beautiful limestone architecture.

name: Mexico
info: Mexico is rich in Aztec and Mayan history, famous for tacos, tequila, Day of the Dead, beaches, and vibrant culture.

name: Mongolia

name: Morocco
info: Morocco enchants with colorful souks, Sahara Desert, blue city Chefchaouen, Marrakech, and delicious tagine cuisine.

name: Myanmar
info: Myanmar has thousands of golden Buddhist temples, including magnificent Bagan with 2,000+ ancient pagodas, and Inle Lake.

name: Nepal
info: Nepal is home to Mount Everest, birthplace of Buddha, stunning Himalayan treks, and warm, welcoming Sherpa culture.

name: Netherlands
info: The Netherlands is famous for tulips, windmills, cycling culture, Amsterdam's canals, and being partially below sea level.

name: New Zealand
info: New Zealand has breathtaking landscapes (Lord of the Rings scenery), Maori culture, adventure sports, and friendly kiwis (people and birds).

name: Nigeria
info: Nigeria is Africa's most populous country, home to Nollywood (world's 2nd largest film industry), Afrobeats music, and oil wealth.

name: North Korea

name: Norway
info: Norway is famous for stunning fjords, Northern Lights, midnight sun, Vikings, oil wealth, and high quality of life.

name: Oman
info: Oman has stunning deserts, mountains, beautiful beaches, historic forts, frankincense heritage, and traditional Bedouin culture.

name: Pakistan
info: Pakistan has K2 (world's 2nd highest peak), ancient Indus Valley civilization, passionate cricket culture, and diverse landscapes.

name: Panama

name: Papua New Guinea
info: Papua New Guinea has 800+ languages, diverse tribal cultures, pristine rainforests, coral reefs, and unique birds of paradise.

name: Paraguay
info: Paraguay is one of only two landlocked countries in South America, bilingual in Spanish and GuaranÃ­, known for yerba mate.

name: Peru
info: Peru is home to Machu Picchu, the Inca civilization, Amazon rainforest, Nazca Lines, and incredible cuisine including ceviche.

name: Philippines
info: The Philippines is an archipelago of 7,640 islands, known for pristine beaches, friendly people, Spanish colonial heritage, and jeepneys.

name: Poland
info: Poland has a resilient history, medieval old towns, Chopin's music, pierogi cuisine, and the Wieliczka salt mine cathedral.

name: Portugal

name: Qatar

name: Romania

name: Russia
info: Russia is the world's largest country by area, spanning two continents, known for its rich history, literature, and harsh winters.

name: Rwanda

name: Saudi Arabia
info: Saudi Arabia is the birthplace of Islam, home to Mecca and Medina, vast oil reserves, and undergoing rapid modernization.

name: Senegal
info: Senegal is known for vibrant music scene (mbalax), colorful markets, French colonial heritage, and the pink Lake Retba.

name: Serbia
info: Serbia has a rich history, vibrant Belgrade nightlife, beautiful monasteries, Novi Sad's EXIT festival, and hearty cuisine.

name: Singapore

name: Slovakia

name: Slovenia

name: South Africa
info: South Africa is the Rainbow Nation with incredible wildlife safaris, Cape Town's beauty, Nelson Mandela's legacy, and 11 official languages.

name: South Korea
info: South Korea is a global leader in technology and pop culture, known for K-pop, K-dramas, Samsung, and delicious cuisine like kimchi.

name: Spain
info: Spain is famous for flamenco, paella, bullfighting, GaudÃ­'s architecture, beautiful beaches, and vibrant fiestas.

name: Sri Lanka
info: Sri Lanka is the pearl of the Indian Ocean, famous for Ceylon tea, ancient temples, elephants, and pristine beaches.

name: Sudan
info: Sudan has more ancient pyramids than Egypt (over 200), the Nile River, and was home to the ancient Kingdom of Kush.

name: Sweden
info: Sweden is known for IKEA, Volvo, ABBA, Nobel Prize, beautiful archipelagos, progressive social policies, and midnight sun.

name: Switzerland
info: Switzerland has stunning Alps, chocolate, watches, banking, neutrality, cheese fondue, and picturesque mountain villages.

name: Syria
info: Syria has one of the oldest civilizations, Damascus (world's oldest continuously inhabited city), ancient Palmyra ruins, and rich history.

name: Taiwan
info: Taiwan is a tech powerhouse producing semiconductors, known for night markets, bubble tea, Taipei 101, and beautiful scenery.

name: Tanzania
info: Tanzania has Mount Kilimanjaro, Serengeti wildlife migration, Zanzibar beaches, Ngorongoro Crater, and incredible safari experiences.

name: Thailand
info: Thailand is the Land of Smiles with golden temples, delicious street food, tropical islands, Bangkok's energy, and warm hospitality.

name: Tunisia
info: Tunisia has ancient Carthage ruins, Star Wars filming locations in the Sahara, Mediterranean beaches, and Arab Spring origins.

name: Turkey

name: Uganda

name: Ukraine
info: Ukraine is Europe's breadbasket with vast wheat fields, rich Cossack history, colorful folk traditions, and beautiful Orthodox churches.

name: United Arab Emirates
info: The UAE has Dubai's Burj Khalifa, Abu Dhabi's Grand Mosque, luxury shopping, desert safaris, and rapid modernization.

name: United Kingdom
info: The UK consists of England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland, known for its royal family, rich history, and global cultural influence.

name: United States
info: The United States is a vast country known for technological innovation, Hollywood, diverse landscapes from deserts to mountains, and cultural influence.

name: Uruguay
info: Uruguay is South America's smallest Spanish-speaking country, famous for football, beaches, progressive policies, and gaucho culture.

name: Uzbekistan

name: Vietnam

name: Yemen

name: Zambia

name: Zimbabwe
info: Zimbabwe has Victoria Falls, Great Zimbabwe ruins (ancient stone city), stunning wildlife parks, and diverse African culture.

name: Angola
info: Angola has rich oil and diamond resources, Portuguese colonial heritage, stunning Kalandula Falls, and diverse wildlife.

name: Chad
info: Chad has Lake Chad, Sahara Desert landscapes, the Ennedi Plateau's rock formations, and diverse ethnic groups.

name: Congo
info: Republic of the Congo has dense rainforests, Congo River, lowland gorillas, and rich biodiversity in its national parks.

name: DR Congo
info: Democratic Republic of Congo is Africa's 2nd largest country with vast rainforests, Congo River, mountain gorillas, and mineral wealth.

name: Eritrea
info: Eritrea has beautiful Art Deco architecture in Asmara, Red Sea coastline, Italian colonial heritage, and diverse cultures.

name: Guinea
info: Guinea has world's largest bauxite reserves, source of Niger River, Mount Nimba, and rich musical traditions.

name: Ivory Coast
info: Ivory Coast (CÃ´te d'Ivoire) is world's largest cocoa producer, has beautiful beaches, Yamoussoukro Basilica, and French influence.

name: Liberia
info: Liberia was founded by freed American slaves in 1847, has tropical rainforests, Sapo National Park, and resilient spirit.

name: Libya
info: Libya has spectacular Roman ruins at Leptis Magna, vast Sahara Desert, ancient Greek city Cyrene, and oil reserves.

name: Mauritania
info: Mauritania is 90% Sahara Desert, has the ancient trading cities of Chinguetti and Ouadane, and nomadic culture.

name: Mauritius
info: Mauritius is a tropical paradise in the Indian Ocean with pristine beaches, coral reefs, multicultural heritage, and extinct dodo bird history.

name: Mozambique
info: Mozambique has stunning Indian Ocean coastline, Bazaruto Archipelago, Portuguese colonial heritage, and vibrant music culture.

name: Namibia
info: Namibia has the world's oldest desert (Namib), stunning red sand dunes at Sossusvlei, Etosha wildlife, and Skeleton Coast.

name: Niger
info: Niger is mostly Sahara Desert, has Air Mountains, Niger River, uranium resources, and ancient Tuareg culture.

name: Somalia
info: Somalia has Africa's longest coastline, ancient maritime trading history, frankincense production, and nomadic pastoral culture.

name: South Sudan
info: South Sudan is the world's youngest country (independent 2011), has Nile River, Sudd wetlands, and diverse ethnic groups.

name: Togo
info: Togo is a narrow country with voodoo culture origins, beautiful beaches, colorful markets, and the Koutammakou landscape.

name: Turkmenistan
info: Turkmenistan has the 'Door to Hell' gas crater burning since 1971, vast desert, ancient Merv ruins, and authoritarian government.

name: Kyrgyzstan
info: Kyrgyzstan has stunning Tian Shan mountains, Song-Kul Lake, nomadic yurt culture, eagle hunting traditions, and Silk Road history.

name: Tajikistan
info: Tajikistan is 93% mountainous with Pamir Mountains, stunning Wakhan Corridor, Silk Road heritage, and Persian cultural ties.

name: East Timor
info: East Timor (Timor-Leste) gained independence in 2002, has beautiful coral reefs, mountains, coffee production, and Portuguese heritage.

name: North Macedonia
info: North Macedonia has Lake Ohrid (UNESCO site and oldest lake in Europe), Alexander the Great's heritage, and beautiful mountains.

name: Montenegro
info: Montenegro has stunning Adriatic coastline, Bay of Kotor, dramatic mountains, medieval old towns, and outdoor adventures.

name: Kosovo
info: Kosovo declared independence in 2008, has medieval Serbian monasteries, young population, and rich Ottoman and Byzantine heritage.

name: Moldova
info: Moldova has the world's largest underground wine cellar (Milestii Mici), beautiful monasteries, and rich winemaking traditions.

name: Monaco
info: Monaco is the world's 2nd smallest country, a luxurious tax haven famous for casinos, Grand Prix, and yacht-filled harbor.

name: Andorra
info: Andorra is a tiny principality in the Pyrenees mountains between France and Spain, famous for skiing and duty-free shopping.

name: Liechtenstein
info: Liechtenstein is one of world's smallest and richest countries, nestled in Alps between Switzerland and Austria with a prince's castle.

name: San Marino
info: San Marino is the world's oldest republic (founded 301 AD), completely surrounded by Italy, with medieval architecture on Mount Titano.

name: Vatican City
info: Vatican City is the world's smallest country, home to the Pope, St. Peter's Basilica, Sistine Chapel, and center of Catholic Church.

name: Seychelles
info: Seychelles is an archipelago of 115 islands in Indian Ocean with pristine beaches, giant tortoises, unique granite formations, and luxury resorts.

name: Comoros
info: Comoros is a volcanic archipelago between Madagascar and Mozambique, known for ylang-ylang perfume production and Arab-African culture.

name: Cape Verde
info: Cape Verde is an Atlantic island chain off West Africa, famous for morna music, volcanic landscapes, and Creole culture.

name: Equatorial Guinea
info: Equatorial Guinea is Africa's only Spanish-speaking country, has significant oil wealth, Bioko Island, and tropical rainforests.

name: Djibouti
info: Djibouti is strategically located at the Red Sea entrance, has Lake Assal (Africa's lowest point), and hosts multiple foreign military bases.

name: Gabon
info: Gabon is 88% covered by rainforest with incredible wildlife including gorillas and elephants, oil wealth, and low population density.

name: Gambia
info: Gambia is Africa's smallest mainland country, shaped along Gambia River, surrounded by Senegal, known for birdwatching and beaches.

name: Guinea-Bissau
info: Guinea-Bissau has the BijagÃ³s Archipelago with pristine islands, cashew production, Portuguese colonial history, and diverse wildlife.

name: Lesotho
info: Lesotho is completely surrounded by South Africa, known as 'Kingdom in the Sky' with entire country above 1,000m elevation.

name: Malawi
info: Malawi has stunning Lake Malawi with 1000+ colorful cichlid fish species, friendly people, and is called the 'Warm Heart of Africa'.

name: Burkina Faso
info: Burkina Faso means 'Land of Upright People', known for vibrant arts scene, FESPACO film festival, and traditional masks.

name: Benin
info: Benin is the birthplace of voodoo religion, former Kingdom of Dahomey, has palaces on stilts at GanviÃ©, and rich cultural heritage.

name: Burundi
info: Burundi is known for powerful traditional drumming, Lake Tanganyika, tea plantations, and beautiful hilly landscapes.

name: Central African Republic
info: Central African Republic has diamond resources, Dzanga-Sangha rainforest with gorillas and elephants, and diverse wildlife.

name: Swaziland
info: Eswatini (Swaziland) is Africa's last absolute monarchy, known for Umhlanga Reed Dance, wildlife reserves, and beautiful scenery.

name: Sierra Leone
info: Sierra Leone has beautiful beaches, blood diamond history, Bunce Island slave fort, resilient people, and Freetown's Cotton Tree.

name: Trinidad and Tobago
info: Trinidad and Tobago is birthplace of steelpan music and calypso, has vibrant Carnival, diverse culture, and natural beauty.

name: Saint Lucia
info: Saint Lucia has iconic twin Piton mountains, volcanic beaches, rainforests, luxury resorts, and produced two Nobel Prize winners.

name: Grenada
info: Grenada is the 'Spice Isle' producing nutmeg and mace, has beautiful beaches, underwater sculpture park, and Grand Anse Beach.

name: Antigua and Barbuda
info: Antigua and Barbuda has 365 beaches (one for each day), Nelson's Dockyard, sailing culture, and pristine Caribbean waters.

name: Saint Vincent and Grenadines
info: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines has 32 islands, world-class sailing, Tobago Cays, active volcano La SoufriÃ¨re, and film location for Pirates of Caribbean.

name: Dominica
info: Dominica is the 'Nature Isle' with 365 rivers, Boiling Lake, Morne Trois Pitons National Park, rainforests, and pristine wilderness.

name: Saint Kitts and Nevis
info: Saint Kitts and Nevis is a dual-island nation with Brimstone Hill Fortress, beautiful beaches, rainforest, and sugar plantation heritage.

name: Samoa
info: Samoa has strong Polynesian culture, stunning To-Sua Ocean Trench, traditional fa'a Samoa lifestyle, beautiful beaches, and friendly people.

name: Tonga
info: Tonga is the only Pacific kingdom never colonized, famous for swimming with humpback whales, traditional culture, and coral reefs.

name: Vanuatu
info: Vanuatu has active volcanoes including accessible Mount Yasur, traditional kastom culture, coral reefs, and consistently ranks as world's happiest place.

name: Solomon Islands
info: Solomon Islands has world-class diving with WWII wrecks, pristine reefs, traditional Melanesian culture, and remote tropical islands.

name: Micronesia
info: Federated States of Micronesia has 607 islands, Chuuk Lagoon's WWII wrecks, ancient stone money on Yap, and pristine diving.

name: Palau
info: Palau has stunning Rock Islands, Jellyfish Lake, world-class diving, marine sanctuary, and was first to ban reef-toxic sunscreen.

name: Marshall Islands
info: Marshall Islands is made of 29 coral atolls, was nuclear testing site, has traditional stick chart navigation, and pristine lagoons.

name: Kiribati
info: Kiribati straddles the equator and International Date Line, first to see each new day, vulnerable to climate change with low-lying atolls.

name: Nauru
info: Nauru is the world's smallest island nation and 3rd smallest country, once rich from phosphate mining, now facing environmental challenges.

name: Tuvalu
info: Tuvalu is one of world's smallest countries, earns revenue from .tv domain, most vulnerable to sea level rise, with traditional Polynesian culture.

name: Maldives
info: The Maldives is a tropical paradise of 1,200 coral islands, famous for luxury resorts, crystal waters, and incredible diving.

name: Brunei
info: Brunei is a tiny but wealthy nation on Borneo, known for oil wealth, the Sultan's opulent palace, and pristine rainforests.

name: Suriname
info: Suriname is South America's smallest country, Dutch-speaking, incredibly diverse with rainforests covering 93% and unique cultural mix.

name: Guyana
info: Guyana has Kaieteur Falls (5x higher than Niagara), pristine Amazon rainforest, diverse wildlife, and emerging oil industry.
